base_description: Rectangular gray sideboard with drawers and cabinets.
part_description: Includes two cabinets, two drawers, and a lower shelf. Cabinets on each side, drawers centered above the shelf. Rectangular shape, medium size.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide within the central compartment, while the cabinet doors open outward on hinges. The shelf is supported by the frame, providing stability. Each part is integrated into the rectangular structure, allowing for organized storage.
external_interaction_description: The sideboard can be placed against a wall, used for storage or display. Its surface can hold decorative items, while the drawers and cabinets store various items. The design allows easy access for users to open and close compartments.
